summary: A chronicle of the sordid life and suspicious death of Rolling Stones co-founder Brian Jones, who was found in the bottom of his swimming pool weeks after being let go from the band.
cast: Leo Gregory|Paddy Considine|David Morrissey|Ben Whishaw|Tuva Novotny|Amelia Warner|Monet Mazur|Luke de Woolfson|David Walliams|David Williams|Gary Love|Johnny Shannon|Melanie Ramsay|Rüdiger Rudolph|Will Adamsdale|Ralph Brown|Alfie Allen|Guy Flanagan|Josef Altin|Vanessa Langford|James D. White|Lisa O'Reilly|Jenna Aarons|Tom Espiner|Anna Madeley|Gerard Bell|Paul Raffield|Angela Sims|Lisa Dolan|Dirk Von Bruck|Simon Chandler|Nathalie Cox|Tim Flavin|Simon Minihane|Ras Barker|India Weber|Matt Gogarty|Abdsaker Tabaa|Mark Frost|Robert Dearle|Alex Dee|Clive Elkington|Will Hodgkinson|Calum MacNab|Cherie Nichole|Ed Pearce|Simona Roman|Joanna Ranee Wood
title: Stoned, el genuino Rolling Stone
